mapper.select: SELECT b.BOARD_NO as boardNo, p.PRODUCT_NO as productNo, p.PRODUCT_NAME as productName, p.PRODUCT_PRICE as productPrice, p.PRODUCT_OPTION as productOption, p.DISCOUNT_RATE as discountRate, p.DISCOUNT_PRICE as discountPrice, m.MEDIA_NAME as mediaName, m.MEDIA_DATA as mediaData FROM PRODUCT p, PRODUCT_BOARD b, BOARD_MEDIA m WHERE p.PRODUCT_NO = b.PRODUCT_NO AND b.BOARD_NO = m.BOARD_NO AND b.BOARD_NO = #{bno} AND m.MEDIA_NAME like '%main_thumbnail%'

SELECT BOARD_NO as boardNo, ITEM as item, WEIGHT as weight, PRODUCER as producer, ORIGIN as origin, PRODUCTION_DATE as productionDate, DETAIL as detail, IMPORTED_FOOD_STATEMENT as importedFoodStatement, COMPOSITION as composition, STORAGE_TYPE as storageType, PRECAUTION as precaution, CS_CONTACT as csContact FROM FOOD_REQUIRED_INFO WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
SELECT MEDIA_NO as mediaNo, BOARD_NO as boardNo, MEDIA_NAME as mediaName, MEDIA_DATA as mediaData FROM BOARD_MEDIA WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND MEDIA_NAME LIKE '%content%'
select MEDIA_NAME as mediaName, MEDIA_DATA as mediaData from PRODUCT_BOARD b, BOARD_MEDIA m where b.BOARD_NO = m.BOARD_NO and b.BOARD_NO = #{bno} and MEDIA_NAME like '%detailView_main%'
mapper.update: MERGE INTO CART USING DUAL ON (SHOPPER_NO = #{SHOPPER_NO} and PRODUCT_NO = #{PRODUCT_NO}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET CART_PRODUCT_STOCK = #{CART_PRODUCT_STOCK} + CART_PRODUCT_STOCK WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (SHOPPER_NO, PRODUCT_NO, CART_PRODUCT_STOCK) VALUES (#{SHOPPER_NO}, #{PRODUCT_NO}, #{CART_PRODUCT_STOCK})
mapper.select: select count(*) from PRODUCT_INQUIRY where BOARD_NO = #{BOARD_NO}
